title: Comprehensive Study Material
text: PW provides comprehensive study materials including live and recorded video lectures, detailed notes, practice questions, sample papers, and previous-year papers across subjects for school and competitive exams.

title: NCERT Solutions
text: Physics Wallah provides free and comprehensive NCERT solutions for classes 6–12 covering exercises, examples, and in-depth explanations aligned with CBSE curriculum.

title: Formula Sheets & Handouts
text: Students receive condensed formula sheets and topic-wise handouts that summarise key formulas and concepts—ideal for quick revision before exams.

title: Test Series & Quizzes
text: PW offers a robust test series system including daily quizzes,weekly mock tests and full‑length sample tests with instant results and performance analytics.

title: 24/7 Doubt Support
text: Physics Wallah provides around‑the‑clock doubt‑solving support through live sessions, a doubt portal, and discussion forums staffed by faculty mentors.

title: PW Library
text: The PW Library is a freemium repository offering thousands of solved module papers, NCERT solutions, sample papers and alumni‑shared notes—freely accessible via the app.

title: Subject-wise Notes
text: Subject-specific notes are curated for each subject (Physics, Chemistry, Maths, Biology), with chapter-wise segmentation and solved/unsolved practice questions.

title: Progress Dashboard
text: Students can track their learning through a dashboard that displays metrics like tests taken, accuracy, strengths/weaknesses, and time spent per topic.

title: Offline Centres
text: PW operates over 100 offline centres across India, offering hybrid support and in-person doubt‑solving alongside digital content.

title: Competitive Exam Material
text: Physics Wallah provides tailored study material (notes, question banks, sample papers) for competitive exams like IIT‑JEE, NEET, GATE, SSC, UPSC and more.

title: Mind Maps for Quick Revision
text: Physics Wallah offers subject-wise mind maps that summarize key concepts in a visual format, helping students retain and revise topics effectively.

title: Previous Year Question Paper Analysis
text: PW provides detailed video and PDF analysis of previous year question papers to help students understand exam trends, weightage, and common question types.

title: E-books and Digital Notes
text: Digital copies of important reference books and in-house notes are available on the PW app to help students study anytime, anywhere.

title: Subjective and Objective Practice Sets
text: PW provides both objective (MCQs) and subjective (long answer) practice sets with solutions, catering to different exam formats.

title: Topic-wise Assignments
text: Students receive structured topic-wise assignments for every chapter, ensuring step-by-step mastery of the syllabus.

title: Flashcards for Formula & Facts
text: Flashcards are provided for quick memorization of important formulas, definitions, and one-liners, ideal for last-minute revision.

title: Handwritten Notes by Top Educators
text: High-quality handwritten notes prepared by PW educators are provided to build conceptual clarity and boost retention.

title: Study Material in Multiple Languages
text: PW offers study material in English, Hindi, and Hinglish to ensure accessibility for students from diverse linguistic backgrounds.

title: Downloadable PDFs
text: Almost all study materials, notes, and question banks are available as PDFs for offline access and printing.

title: Smart Notes (Condensed Notes)
text: Smart Notes provide condensed and curated summaries for quick learning, ideal during the final days before the exam.

title: Solved Examples for Key Topics
text: Every topic is supported by solved examples explained step-by-step to help students grasp concepts and apply them easily.

title: Personalized Study Scheduler
text: PW's AI-based scheduler helps students plan their day, track syllabus completion, and set custom learning goals.

title: Hybrid Study Packages
text: PW offers hybrid programs combining online classes with offline center support, printed books, and dedicated doubt mentors.

title: Animated Concept Explanations
text: Animated videos and 3D visualizations are used to explain tough science concepts in a simple, engaging manner.

title: Mastery Tests at End of Topic
text: Each topic concludes with a mastery test to assess whether the student has fully understood and retained the concept.

title: Class Notes & Replay Access
text: PW offers downloadable class notes and recorded video access, so students can revisit concepts any time.

title: Sample Papers for Practice
text: Regularly updated sample papers aligned with latest exam pattern are available for NEET, JEE, Boards, and CUET.

title: PW Booklets (Printed Material)
text: Printed booklets are available for students enrolled in premium courses, containing notes, MCQs, and chapter summaries.

title: Study Strategy Guides
text: PW educators share preparation strategies, time management tips, and exam hacks tailored for different exams.

title: CUET Study Material
text: Dedicated material including video lectures, notes, and mock tests is available for Common University Entrance Test (CUET) aspirants.

title: Formative Assessments
text: Physics Wallah includes formative assessments like short quizzes and polls during lectures to boost engagement and check understanding.

title: Leaderboards and Rankings
text: Students can track their performance and compare with peers through leaderboards, which helps build healthy competition and motivation.

title: Chapter-wise PYQs
text: PW organizes Previous Year Questions chapter-wise for easy and focused practice across JEE, NEET, and Boards.

title: Daily Practice Problems (DPP)
text: Daily Practice Problems are short sets of MCQs and numericals designed to reinforce key concepts from each lecture.

title: All India Test Series (AITS)
text: PW’s AITS simulates real exam conditions and ranks students nationwide, providing percentile scores and detailed performance analysis.

title: Live Quizzes During Class
text: Real-time quizzes are conducted during live classes to keep students engaged and provide instant feedback.

title: Bilingual Content Support
text: Courses and notes are available in bilingual formats (Hindi + English) to support a wider student base.

title: Hinglish Medium Courses
text: Many PW courses are offered in Hinglish — a mix of Hindi and English — to match the comfort of regional learners.

title: 1-on-1 Subject Expert Support
text: Premium students can book time slots for personal doubt clearing with experienced subject experts via video calls.

title: Crash Course / Bootcamp
text: Before exams, PW offers rapid revision crash courses that cover the entire syllabus in a condensed, high-impact format.

title: Boards-Focused Study Packs
text: Specialized packs target board exams with structured notes, sample board questions, and subjective answer writing practice.

title: Parent Monitoring Dashboard
text: Parents can view student progress reports, attendance, and test results through a dedicated dashboard for transparency and involvement.

title: PW Capsules for Concept Clarity
text: Capsule videos provide short, focused concept explanations perfect for quick learning or difficult topic reinforcement.

title: Smart Tagging by Subject and Topic
text: All content is smart-tagged with subject, topic, and chapter names to aid retrieval, filtering, and personalized learning.

title: Student-Mentor Connect
text: Mentorship sessions allow students to talk with toppers and mentors about exam stress, planning, and strategy.

title: Weekly Target Plans
text: Each course includes weekly goal sheets, assigning videos, questions, and reading—ideal for staying on track.

title: Free Course Previews
text: Free previews of courses and chapters are available so students can explore the teaching style before enrolling.

title: Batch Switch Flexibility
text: Students can switch batches based on language or timing preferences, subject to seat availability.

title: Customizable Timetable
text: PW’s learning dashboard allows students to set and customize their own study schedules based on preferences and syllabus.

title: Topic-Wise Revision Checklists
text: Each topic comes with a revision checklist that students can use to mark progress and focus on weak areas.
